name: HoleageddonJJ
description:
A Game about destroying the raccoon world by devouring its's inhabitants with holes in the ground. Click to spawn a hole and spawn additional holes by clicking on the hotbar and then on the ground, buy holes on the world map, and move around levels with WASD + scroll wheel (zoom).

CONTAINS:

  • Racoons!
  • Holes
  • Mass Extinction!
